author: Special Correspondent
text:
The corporation demolished the Vinayaka Temple at Muthampalayam Park in Erode in compliance with court order on Thursday. —PHOTO: M. GOVARTHAN

The City Corporation on Thursday demolished the Vinayaka Temple at Muthamlalayam, in compliance with a court order.

The action was delayed for over six months as most of the residents of Muthampalayam Housing Colony Phase I resisted the Corporation's move. Since the local body had a deadline to execute the order, it carried out the demolition with police protection. The action followed issuance of notices. The temple’s presence in the locality became a legal complication after a resident moved the court saying the construction had been carried out at a spot earmarked for Park.
title: Corporation demolishes Vinayaka Temple at Muthampalayam
